name: vorticity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the size or speed of a vortex (= a mass of air or water that spins around very fast and pulls objects into its empty centre), or the fact that it exists: This technique might be used to calculate a local vortex density, or vorticity. Vorticity is generated as the cylinder moves through the fluid.
More examplesFewer examplesThe relative vorticity becomes negative (anticyclonic) as latitude increases. Researchers attempted to quantify blood flow distribution and vorticity towards the pulmonary arteries.The amount of vorticity varies.The vorticity vector gives the average density and direction of the vortices.
